Articles.Content: I think ksp2 should have a way to record and project old launches. For example if you upgrade a rocket you can project a ghost of the previous model which would be a transparent image of it and see which preformed better.
That'd be really cool. Or, at least, some kind of graph to compare two rockets.

4 hours ago, whatsEJstandfor said:

That'd be really cool. Or, at least, some kind of graph to compare two rockets.

This would be very nice, I think a graph allowing a comparison of rockets would be very nice. Maybe they could be a way to collect science....
